clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) in Combination With Dacarbazine in Patients With Unresectable/Metastatic Melanoma.
clinical_study.official_title: An Open Label Study to Determine the Effect of Avastin in Combination With Dacarbazine on Overall Response Rate in Patients With Unresectable/Metastatic Melanoma

brief_summary.textblock: This study will assess the preliminary antitumor activity and safety profile of a combination of Avastin and dacarbazine in patients with unresectable/metastatic melanoma not previously treated with chemotherapy for metastatic disease. Patients will receive Avastin 10mg/kg iv every 2 weeks and dacarbazine 800mg/m2 every 4 weeks. The anticipated time on study treatment is until disease progression.

primary_outcome.measure: Overall response rate (complete and partial responses), tumor assessments by computer tomography (CT) or magnetic resonance imaging (MRI)

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of response; tumor assessments by CT or MRI
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from response to progressive disease (up to 4 years)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to progression; tumor assessments by CT or MRI
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from baseline to disease progression or death of any cause (up to 4 years)
from baseline to death of any cause (up to 4 years)
